section.simpara: Sends a TIFF file as a fax.

SendFax() and ReceiveFax() replace the well-known fax patch Fax commands TxFax() and RxFax() and, like them, they use the SpanDSP SpanDSP
Fax library.
section.programlisting: exten => 123,1,Set(LOCALSTATIONID=My Company) exten => 123,n,Set(LOCALHEADERINFO=My Company - There when you need us) exten => 123,n,SendFAX(/tmp/offer.tif) exten => 123,n,Verbose(1,### FAXSTATUS: ${FAXSTATUS}) exten => 123,n,Verbose(1,### FAXERROR: ${FAXERROR}) exten => 123,n,Verbose(1,### FAXMODE: ${FAXMODE}) exten => 123,n,Verbose(1,### FAXPAGES: ${FAXPAGES}) exten => 123,n,Verbose(1,### FAXBITRATE: ${FAXBITRATE}) exten => 123,n,Verbose(1,### FAXRESOLUTION: ${FAXRESOLUTION}) exten => 123,n,Verbose(1,### REMOTESTATIONID: ${REMOTESTATIONID}) exten => 123,n,Hangup()
